verbose_text: We show that depletion of the nuclear import factor importin beta1 from axons by a 3 ' UTR knockout (KO) or by sequestration of nucleolin, an RNA binding protein (RBP) involved in importin beta1 axonal localization, enhances neuronal outgrowth, concomitantly with a subcellular shift in protein synthesis.
